label.intro:
Objectives

  1. We want to know what skills and experiences the students on this course have so that we can adapt our teaching to build on their knowledge. Your task is to design a survey and report on this information.

  2. We will learn to use a digital data collection method, notably Open Data Kit (ODK) questionnaires.

  3. The survey data may be used to inform a subsequent qualitative study at the end of the course, highlighting the value of mixed methods.
